org.opensaml.soap.soap11.decoder.http.impl

Class SimplePayloadBodyHandler<MessageType extends org.opensaml.core.xml.XMLObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.AbstractInitializableComponent
      • org.opensaml.messaging.handler.AbstractMessageHandler<MessageType>
        • org.opensaml.soap.soap11.decoder.http.impl.SimplePayloadBodyHandler<MessageType>
  • Type Parameters:
    MessageType - the message type of the message context on which to operate
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.Component, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.DestructableComponent, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.InitializableComponent, org.opensaml.messaging.handler.MessageHandler<MessageType>

    public class SimplePayloadBodyHandler<MessageType extends org.opensaml.core.xml.XMLObject>
extends org.opensaml.messaging.handler.AbstractMessageHandler<MessageType>
    A body handler for use with HTTPSOAP11Decoder that populates the context message with the payload from the SOAP Envelope Body. The first child element of of the SOAP Envelope's Body is chosen as the message.
